thread.title: IDI reports 2Q loss

title: IDI reports 2Q loss
text:
Done 
SHANGHAI (AP) _ IDI Inc. (IDI) on Friday reported a loss of $45.5 million in its second quarter. 
The Shanghai-based company said it had a loss of $3.27 per share. Losses, adjusted to account for discontinued operations, were 28 cents per share. 
The information solutions provider posted revenue of $994,000 in the period. 
IDI shares have climbed 97 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has nearly tripled in the last 12 months. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on IDI at http://www.zacks.com/ap/IDI
